node.name: accept - accept an incoming socket connect
node.description: Accepts an incoming socket connect, just as the accept(2) system call does. Returns the packed address if it succeeded, FALSE otherwise. See example in [%linkNodeTitle "perlman:perlipc|Sockets: Client/Server Communication", $NODE, "Sockets: Client/Server Communication",{anchor=>"Sockets_Client_Server_Communica"};%].
node.title: perlfunc:accept
